title: Allow me to introduce, the Citroen C15
author: colinprince
aiHeadline: Citroen C15: Because who doesn't want a car that looks like it was designed by a drunkards' committee in a parallel universe where functionality is optional?

title: I replaced Windows with Linux and everything's going great
author: rorylawless
aiHeadline: Switching to Linux: Because who needs stability when you can have the thrill of debugging your terminal every morning like it's a religious experience?

title: Eulogy for Dark Sky, a data visualization masterpiece (2023)
author: skadamat
aiHeadline: Farewell to Dark Sky: The weather app so good it became a relic, proving that sometimes the best things in life are the ones that get taken away before you can fully appreciate them.

title: Open Chaos: A self-evolving open-source project
author: stefanvdw1
aiHeadline: Open Chaos: The open-source project that proves even anarchy can be self-evolving, because why have a plan when you can have spontaneous combustion?

title: Oh My Zsh adds bloat
author: fla
aiHeadline: Oh My Zsh Adds Bloat: Because minimalism was overrated, and now your shell can be as bloated as your ego!
